title.en: Respiratory Pulse of the Emerald Flow

description.ko: 고요한 호흡 상태에 있는 살아있는 유기체로, 생물학적 질감과 액체 빛이 조화롭게 어우러진 모습입니다.
description.en: A living, breathing organic entity captured in a state of tranquil respiration, blending biological textures with liquid light.

prompt: An ultra-detailed cinematic 3D render of AURA-7, representing the theme of Organic Flow. A complex, breathing respiratory structure formed from interwoven #7FB069 emerald moss and #2D5A3D vascular vines suspended in a weightless #E6F2E1 pearlescent mist. The entity rhythmically exhales #FFE66D golden bioluminescent spores that move like liquid silk. Macro focus on translucent organic membranes, showcasing hyper-realistic fluid dynamics and undulating movement. 8k resolution, rendered in Octane with volumetric light shafts and soft bokeh, capturing a divine and serene natural atmosphere.
